summary: Adds a disenchantable dagger that allows you to enchant weapons with the slow enchant found in potions.
descriptionHtml:
Just something I\'ve been using myself that I thought perhaps the community would want. It bothered me that the slow effect, which is so useful for archers, was not available for chanting on weapons. Now it is. 

*****This item can be found at the entrance to Breezehome house in Whiterun********
author: Grudge
